text:
Black Americans represent a disproportionate number of COVID-19 related deaths but are underrepresented in vaccination numbers. It begs the question: why aren’t BIPOC people rushing to get in line in high numbers? https://t.co/RO3oZHMYlG 

#covid19 #vaccine #vaccinehesitancy https://t.co/Fj4sUoV0HD
